headline.main: ANXIETY OF CHINA OVER INDIA GROWS; Information Chief Stresses Interest in Seeing Cripps Mission's Success EMPIRE ROLE IS UPHELD Proposals Found to Prove That the Atlantic Charter Applies to Pacific

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, March 31 -- The Chinese are becoming increasingly concerned over the possibility of failure of Sir Stafford Cripps's mission to India.
abstract: On Sir S Cripps mission to India
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, March 31 -- The Chinese are becoming increasingly concerned over the possibility of failure of Sir Stafford Cripps's mission to India....

byline.original: By HARRISON FORMANWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
